module.p:
ach a-mhàin apart from, aside from –
Tha ar linn fhìn a’ coimhead gur e feallsanach mór a bh’ ann de Khierkegaard, gidheadh feallsanach eu-coltach ri a roi-shealbhadairean, ach a-mhàin, ’s math dh’ fhaoite, Nietzche.
Our own era views Kierkegaard as a great philosopher, even if a philosopher different to his predecessors, aside from, perhaps, Nietzsche. td. 103 contextual head?
